name: Bear Creek Community Center
description: Come play pickleball at Bear Creek Community Center in Boulder Creek, CA! There are 4 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. Players have access to restrooms. The courts are free.

name: Brommer Park - Santa Cruz
description: New reservation system! Reservations and live court schedule are on accessible from the scparks.com website. 4 permanent courts with nets, 4 additional courts with bring-your-own-net available when tennis courts are not in use.
open_play_schedule: Santa Cruz pickleball club. Social play first hour then skill play 10-12. Community drop-in is always available on court #1 and on courts #2, #3, #4 when they're not reserved.

name: Callaghan Park
description: Callaghan Park is a place to play pickleball in Watsonville, CA. There are 6 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. Amenities include restrooms and water. The courts are free.

name: La Madrona Athletic Club
description:
La Madrona offers four beautifully lit pickleball courts in the Santa Cruz mountains next to Scotts Valley. Our staff of pickleball professionals is very accommodating to players of all styles and abilities and is dedicated to helping you reach your highest potential.

Our pickleball clinics, drop-ins, and lessons are open to members and non-members all year round.
fees:
Fee required — PRICES
Private lessons available upon request.

1 hour class – $20 members / $25 non-members

1.5 hour class – $25 members / $30 non-members

Member Drop-in, Smash Masters Showdown, Lad

name: Seascape Sports Club
description: Seascape Sports Club is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Aptos, CA. There are 12 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. Amenities include restrooms, a pro shop or equipment store, water, and lights. A membership is required to play.
fees: Members only — Private Club, you need to be a member, a guest of a member, or a guest of the Sea Scape Resort.

name: Sgt. Derby Park - Santa Cruz
description: Come play pickleball at Sgt. Derby Park - Santa Cruz in Santa Cruz, CA! There are 6 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The facility includes amenities like restrooms and water. The courts are free.

name: Skypark Courts
description: Come play pickleball at Skypark Courts in Scotts Valley, CA! There are 8 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The courts are free. The facility includes amenities like lights.

name: Willowbrook Park - Aptos
description: Willowbrook Park - Aptos is a place to play pickleball in Aptos, CA. There are 5 outdoor hard and clay courts. The lines are permanent, and portable nets are available. Amenities include restrooms and water. The courts can be reserved. The courts are free.
